column4: hello everyone i am using ubuntu 10.10 and m trying to open a kannada (indian language ) file . i downloaded a rtf file from internet and i changed the encoding scheme to unicode using enconv command after i change it to unicode the text inside the document is unreadable can anybody help me out plz??
: may i know what is ##linux-india or #ubuntu-in?? is it a command? sorry i am new to ubuntu
they are channel dedicated for indian linux and ubuntu. you can join them by typing /j ##linux-india
